So now I got it working, I reinstalled. Now, however, the map is empty except Instructions.txt after the install.
ahh i got it i had to move the entire .minecraft folder to the desktop the click install. bat :)

Thanks for torrent.

I got it running easy enough but the first multiplayer map i made had a massive hole in it, the kind you saw in older versions when it would bug out and not load a part of the map... except it was the server not generating map there. I actually fell into it and fell forever because there was no bedrock. Lighting is also bugged

Other than that it works

Do villages and wolfes work in smp ?
I flew around in creative mode on my server for quite a long time, found at least 4 pinewood and 2 taiga biomes, but not a single wolf in and no village between them.
(Map/server started with 1.8.1, two of the taiga biomes where "created" in 1.9 pre3)

I also started a new SP creative map, found a pack of wolfes after 2 minutes of flying.

@shaqbrack

1. Extract files on your desktop
2. Run install.bat
3. Run minecraft from your desktop

@Hausser

Villages are working, so are wolves. If the hole in your map is so called "World Hole" you can try relogging to make it work. If it wont, it's a bug in generator.
